# color

**Instance Property**

The color of the place.

## Declaration

```swift
get color(): string;
```

## Discussion

Not all places have a color. You can’t set the color property of the place annotation.

## Annotation properties

- **title**: The title of the feature.
- **featureType**: A value that describes the type of place the feature represents.
- **pointOfInterestCategory**: The point-of-interest category of the feature.
- **glyphImage**: The glyph image for the place.
- **selectedGlyphImage**: The selected glyph image for the place.
